an5.135:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato ranno khattiyassa muddhavasittassa jettho putto rajjam pattheti.
an5.135:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno khattiyassa muddhavasittassa jettho putto ubhato sujato hoti matito ca pitito ca, samsuddhagahaniko, yava sattama pitamahayuga akkhitto anupakkuttho jativadena;
an5.135:1.4: abhirupo hoti dassaniyo pasadiko paramaya vannapokkharataya samannagato;
an5.135:1.7: yani tani rannam khattiyanam muddhavasittanam sippatthanani hatthismim va assasmim va rathasmim va dhanusmim va tharusmim va tattha sikkhito hoti anavayo.
an5.135:2.2: ‘aham khomhi ubhato sujato matito ca pitito ca, samsuddhagahaniko, yava sattama pitamahayuga akkhitto anupakkuttho jativadena.
an5.135:2.4: Aham khomhi abhirupo dassaniyo pasadiko paramaya vannapokkharataya samannagato.
an5.135:2.10: Aham khomhi yani tani rannam khattiyanam muddhavasittanam sippatthanani hatthismim va assasmim va rathasmim va dhanusmim va tharusmim va, tattha sikkhito anavayo.
an5.135:2.12: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi angehi samannagato ranno khattiyassa muddhavasittassa jettho putto rajjam pattheti.
an5.135:3.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu asavanam khayam pattheti.
an5.135:3.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, saddahati tathagatassa bodhim:
an5.135:3.4: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
an5.135:3.5: Appabadho hoti appatanko, samavepakiniya gahaniya samannagato natisitaya naccunhaya majjhimaya padhanakkhamaya;
an5.135:3.6: asatho hoti amayavi, yathabhutam attanam avikatta satthari va vinnusu va sabrahmacarisu;
an5.135:3.7: araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu;
an5.135:3.8: pannava hoti udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
an5.135:4.3: “itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava”ti.
an5.135:4.5: Aham khomhi appabadho appatanko samavepakiniya gahaniya samannagato natisitaya naccunhaya majjhimaya padhanakkhamaya.
an5.135:4.7: Aham khomhi asatho amayavi yathabhutam attanam avikatta satthari va vinnusu va sabrahmacarisu.
an5.135:4.9: Aham khomhi araddhaviriyo viharami akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.135:4.11: Aham khomhi pannava udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
an5.135:4.13: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu asavanam khayam pattheti”ti.
